_header: A new work is come on hand
_description: A carol of the Nativity — six stanzas, aaabab (st. 1 differs) with ‘Alleluya’ burden

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
A nywe werk is come on hondeþorw myȝt & grace of
                    godys sonde…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…Now ioye & blysse be hem a mongeþat thus cunne synge
                    alleluya
